name: Last Stand (Diannara)
description:
The great goblin horde is coming.  You sent the remainder of your group ahead to warn the villages and cities of their approach but stayed behind to defend the magic runes warding them from passing through the great gate.

You alone must stand against the coming horde and buy as much time as possible for those on the other side to prepare for the coming invasion. If the runes are destroyed or you fall in battle the goblin army will march beyond the gate into your homeland.

This will be your last stand...

- WSAD to move
- Space Bar to Jump
- Hold Left Shift to Sprint
- Hold Left Mouse to Attack
- Hold Right Mouse to Block (limited use / on a cooldown)

Added 4/6/2020
- New UI to better indicate which towers are actively being attacked
- Goblins have a small chance to drop a heart which restores a little bit of health when picked up
- Bug fix for Game Over screen not being interactable if you were killed due to being out of bounds or if all three towers are destroyed (Thanks Geo3D!)

Notes:
Sadly I didn't have time to really test and balance much. The game could also use a full pass on feel and polish. It's a bit bare bones with regards to features but the general premise is there. I hope you enjoy it!
